q_en: Which order has the fastest completion progress among the unfinished orders?

steps.sql: SELECT id, order_name FROM orders WHERE id IN (SELECT order_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN (SELECT order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE status != 2));

SELECT o.id, o.order_name, SUM(st.completed_number) / SUM(op.number) AS completion_progress FROM orders o JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id JOIN sewing_tasks st ON op.id = st.order_product_id WHERE st.status != 2 GROUP BY o.id ORDER BY completion_progress DESC LIMIT 1;
steps.description: Calculate the completion progress for each unfinished order
